Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the name of the Multi-Region Access Point.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

The following example grants access permissions to CloudWatch.

It is very important to note where you need to use the name versus the alias for the Multi-Region Access Point. In the following example, the name is DOC-EXAMPLE-MULTI-REGION-ACCESS-POINT, the alias of the Multi-Region Access Point is mfzwi23gnjvgw.mrap, and the AWS account is 123456789012. For more information about how ARNs for Multi-Region Access Points work, see Making requests using a Multi-Region Access Point in the in the Amazon S3 User Guide.
